111.content:
It was night time in the city of Windermere and while in his room, 16 year old Roberto Morse is sitting on his bed staring at his white blank wall, completely in the dark. Roberto or aka Robert couldn’t believe what had happened to him but as he looked at his hands, that glowed with blinding light, he knew that This was not a dream, that what had happened at Misty Birch park was all real.

“Oh man, oh man, oh man, what am I going to do?” Robert asked getting up and pacing around his room.

“I’ve got to tell someone, but who should I tell?”

Robert thinks for a few minutes and finally comes up with a answer.

“I know I’ll tell Arnold.”

Arnold was Roberts best friend, ever since elementary school, that is saying something because Robert didn’t have many friends. Arnold always had Roberts back and vice versa. Robert couldn’t tell his parents who were down stares right now watching tv together, nor could he tell his 18 year old sister, who he didn’t get along with at all, but still loved with all his heart, even though he would never emit it to her face. Robert didn’t know how they would react, therefore Arnold won by default. Robert picks up his phone from off his bed and dials Arnold’s number as fast as he could.

“Hello?” Arnold says sluggishly.

“Hey man I need you to come over like right now.”

“Robert? Why are you ok?” Arnold asks still trying to wake up.

“I, I just need to speak with you man please.” Robert says anxiously.

“Ok, ok I’ll be there soon.” Arnold says a little annoyed.

You felt bad waking up Arnold when he was just trying to get his beauty sleep, but sleep could wait, especially after what happened.

It only took Arnold a few minutes to get to Roberts house. Arnold didn’t use the front door like a normal person, no instead he climbed up to Roberts window, which wasn’t all that strange to Robert. Arnold had done that ever since Robert had known him, plus it helped because your parents didn’t like anyone to come over when it was night time, so yea it worked out for everyone.
He
“Hey man why did you want me to come over so late.” Arnold asked as Robert helped him get inside his room.

“Ok man, I got one hell of a story for you.”

(Flashback)

Robert was walking down the sidewalk. He wore a black jacket a white shirt , and blue jeans with black Nicky shoes. Robert liked taking a walk at night, he loved feeling the cold night air brush up against his brown skin, and blow through his curly hair. It helped him think, especially when he was going through hard times. Robert had another fight with his dad about going into the family business. Roberts dad was the owner of a plumbing business and had always wanted Robert to fallow in his foot steps, but Robert never wanted to go down that path. Robert wanted to do more with his life, but he didn't know what that was yet.

Suddenly something breaks Robert out of his thoughts. Robert looks up towards the dark sky and sees something falling, what ever it was, was big and bright. It looked like a meteor, and it was headed towards Misty Birch Park.

“Boom.” The meteor lands in the center of the park, shaking the surrounding with a earthquake.

Seeing the meteor crash in the distance, Roberto sprints towards the crash site. Roberto entering the park is confronted with black smoke that insulted his lungs with vile gas. Robert looked around at his surroundings, trees were destroyed, and on fire, the ground was up lifted, the once clean roads were now filled with cracks, and were destroyed. That was one hell powerful meteor Robert thought.

Robert made it to the crash zone of the meteor, but what he sees isn’t a meteor at all, but a 50 ft man wearing strange clothing. Robert stand still unable to move.

The 50ft man looked injured, Roberto wasn’t a doctor, but the 50ft man looked really injured. Robert soon finds the strength to move and walks towards the giant man.

The giant man begins to movie and looks towards Robert. Robert stops moving after realizing that the giant man had noticed him.

“@#$(#)$$(@72.” The giant man begins to speak in a language that Robert didn’t understand

“I’m sorry I can’t understand you.” Roberto says pointing to his ears.

The giant man looks at Roberto for a few minutes with a little annoyed look.

“Is this better child, are you able to understand me now?” The giant man asks.

“Oh yes that much better.” Robert says a little surprised by the recent change in the giant mans speaking.

“I swear you lowly little creatures language is so annoying.” The giant man says with a arrogant tone.

“Well sorry if we can’t be as good as you.” Robert says sarcastically with a little bit of attitude.

“Oh it’s alright, not really your fault.” The giant man says, actually thinking that you had truly apologized to him.

Robert was not in the mood for this p, not after having it out with his dad. But even though he wanted to walk away he could leave a injured man.

“Hey look man you are badly injured should I call a ambulance?” Roberto asks.

The giant man starts to smirk and giggle.

“Like your human science can fix me? What a joke.”

Ok that was the last straw, Robert was tired of this mans arrogance.

“Ok well sorry for trying to help! Good luck dude!” Robert says as he started to walk away.

“Wait mortal.” The giant man says

Robert stops walking and turns around.

“Look mortal I am in need of your assistance.” The giant man says.

“Oh really you need the help of a lowly mortal such as myself?” Robert says copying the arrogant tone of the giant man.

The giant man wears a unsatisfactory look.

“Yes.”

“Ok what can I do for you.” Robert says with a little pep in his step.

If it was one thing Robert liked it was putting jerks in their place.

“Look mortal You know I am injured, but in truth I’m not going to last much longer, not with out aid.” The giant man looks down at Robert.

“What can I do to help?” Robert asked. Robert didn’t like this giant jerk, but that didn’t mean he wanted him to die.

“Mortal, we must fuse together.” The giant man says.

“Excuse me.” Robert asks I pot sure he heard what the giant man said.

“We must fuse together. Only by my essence being fused into your body, can I continue to live.”

“What will happen to me, if we decide to do that.” Robert asked a little worried.

“Nothing my subconscious will fade into your psyche, so you don’t have to worry mortal.” The giant man says.

“Ok man my name is not mortal, it’s Roberto Morse.” Robert says putting his hands on his waist.

“What a horrible name, do your parents hate you?” The giant man asks.

“It’s a good name.” Robert says annoyed.

“That reminds me what’s your name, and what the hell are you.” Robert asks

“My name? My name can not be pronounced by people of the lower dimensions, so call me what you wish.” The giant man said.

“Ok I’ll call you Gray.” Robert says.

“Oh god.” Gray says rolling his eyes.

“As to were I come from, l come from the 5th dimension.” Gray says with a sad tone.

“The 5th dimension? What’s that like?” Robert asks.

“It is indescribable, beyond mortal comprehension.”

Gray looks down at Robert.

“So Robert will you help me.” Gray asks.

Robert thinks for a little while.

“Ok we can fuse or whatever.”

“You have my thanks, but a word of caution, you will have all of my powers, do be careful. Oh and one more thing you must never go to the 5th dimension ever.” The giant man says with a stern tone.

“Ok. I won’t go to the 5th dimension.” Robert says feeling a little curious.

Upon making the promise Gray starts to transform into white smoke. The white smoke surrounds Robert, and then before Robert new what was happening, Robert started to inhale the white smoke through his mouth. As the white smoke entered Robert, Robert felt his body being tarred apart, pain indulged Roberts very being, but he couldn’t scream, he couldn’t move. It soon ended, the pain was gone, and Robert was on his knees panting. Gray was gone leaving nothing but a huge crater. Robert looked at his body, Robert felt good no great, and yet scared. What would happen to him.

“Oh man I got to get home.” Robert says.

“Flash.”

Robert was indulged by a blinding light and the next thing he knew he was in in room sitting on his bed. Robert opened his door and alerted his mom and dad that he was home, then returned to sit on his bed.

(End of flashback)

“Oh my god man p, you have super powers.”

11232.content:
"Kyle," a voice softly said, as a small beam of light floated into the dark room. "It's time for school, and your not going to be late again." After he heard this, he knew who it was. He gradually rose from underneath the covers. His black hair hung over his eyes. He pushed it back and threw his feet on the ground. "Okay, mom, I'm up." He remarked as she flipped on the light. She was in a turquoise robe with snowflakes littered around it.. Her light-blonde hair was pulled back in a bun. "Get dressed,I woke you up late." she said, turning to walk out of the room. She stopped halfway and turned around. "Ohh, and its cold outside, so wear a coat." He nodded and sat for a few minutes in a daze. When he finally was half-awake, he stood up.

It had been a week since his fifteenth birthday, and it was surely a very odd day. You see, his family is "different". They have special powers. Mental powers. They can use thier minds to make people say and do things against their will. Kyle, however, is very special, for he can also move objects and see spirits.

He walked over his dresser and pulled out a pair of jeans, a green and black shirt with the saying "Hello: My Names None Of Your Business" and a blue, light jacket. He put the clothes on and started for the door. Suddenly...

112321.content:
As Kyle reached for the doorknob, a weak voice came from behind him. He stopped for a few seconds, sighed, and turned around. A elderly woman was siting on the black desk chair. She was in a yellow flowered dress and three inch white high heels. A wide amber bonnet was on her graying haired head.
"Please child, tell me where I am." She said in a soft, but scared toned voice. Kyle smiled and dropped the heavy backpack making a thud sound.
"What's your name?" He questioned nervously. It was still weird to talk to the undead. He had never really taken anything supernatural seriously before.

The old woman thought for a moment. "My name is Alison Vonstrution," Kyle noticed a small red handbag resting on her lap. "I can't find my husband!" she exclaimed, her voice rising a little. A tear fell from her eye.
"Mrs. Vonstrution, please stop crying," Kyle pleaded. "What year do you think it is?"

Sometimes, or so his grandmother has told, spirits know they are dead. And some, on the other hand, do not. Usually the ones who know were not murdered, and died peacefully. "What do you mean child," she asked. "Why it's...
112321.title: A ghost of a old lady came asking him for help

choices: Kyle changes his mind and calls his mom
He commits to helping Mrs. Vonstruition
1123212.content:
"July 3rd, 2012." Kyle told her. Hearing this calmed the spirit and she stopped crying. Instead she wiped tears that weren't there and rose up from the desk, twirling around in her yellow flower dress. She began to mumble as she danced, Kyle couldn't hear it clearly but figured it was her husband's name. "I made it! I didn't go too far..." She spoke to herself a lot.

"Mrs. Vonstrution?" Kyle interrupted. But the spectral lady was in a trance and she continued her movements as swirls of phantom energy floated around her, crackling against furniture.

Kyle thought about going downstairs right away and letting his mom know that a ghost had visited. This was his family's business after all, and he was still just learning the basics. With barely over a week since his powers manifested, all he had seen were accidents around the local area. But what better way to learn than to take on a new case?

The old woman stopped dancing and took off the bonnet tied around her hair. To Kyle's surprise, the grays were diminished and he could see strands of brown replacing them on the scalp. Her face looked less wrinkled and even her dressed appeared more vibrant as if her ghostly form was taking on more color.

"I was looking for Mesmerize, I have a call of urgent warning from the near-future!"

Using his developing telekinesis, he clumsily retrieved his phone from the desk and began to type as he interviewed Mrs. Vonstrution.

"She's not available but look, I am her son! I can help you."

Mrs. Vonstrution smiled. "Of course you can. An event will happen in a few months that will wipe out 90% of the world! My husband and I... We were fighting the Consumption but it drained him and I perished in the explosion that was meant to defeat it.

Kyle scratched his head in confusion. He had also never heard of a ghost from the future. This encounter was already having him question everything he thought he knew about his abilities. Still he didn't want to give up just yet and go asking his mom for help.

"If you're from the future, Mrs. Vonstruition, how can I help you?"

"I make wormholes, I can't bring myself to before I died... but I can send you to the point in this timeline and you can prevent billions of deaths!"
1123212.title: Year of the Dragon

choices: Use telekinesis to send an object into the vortex
11232122.content:
It was a lot of Kyle to process in the infancy of his powers but this seemed like an opportunity. His mom had never mentioned time travel before, so now he had a chance to really impress everyone with his abilities and show them that although he was new, he could save the world just like they could.

The apparition of Mrs. Vonstruition floated towards the center of the room. She looked at her youngest now, her face looking only a few years older than Kyle. He had so many questions and wanted to ask how she was doing that.. but refrained from doing so to not show his inexperience. Maybe that was something ghosts could do, he really did have plenty to learn about the mysterious Spirit World that his mother had spent years devoted to studying.

"Do not worry, child. These portals may seem.. frightening."
Mrs. Vonstruition spoke, spreading her arms around the center of the room. Sparks of spectral energy began to rise from her limbs as she closed her eyes, concentrating. Kyle began to feel dizzy as if a sickness was overtaking him. "Stand aside for now. When the time is right, you'll know to take the plunge." The now not-so-old lady assured him.

Kyle wasn't feeling so well but indeed, there was a powerful rift spreading throughout the room. The ceiling light swung back and forth and cracks began to form on the walls. Mrs. Vonstruition looked like her body was completely glowing as most of her hair floated up and her skin became translucent, showing a rather disturbing view of her innards. "Ready?"

The wormhole looks beautiful. It seems to keep growing, taking over the room and although something about it disturbs Kyle, he can't help but feel drawn to it. Is this how he can save the timeline? He began walking towards it, his head was pounding and he felt his stomach lurching.

112332.content: A dark figure waits and watches in the darkness of his wrangler jeeps through a pair of binoculars at the lit entrance of the computer store. The manager just finishing his shift and exits. The door is locked and sliding metal mesh gate is pulled down and also locked. Patiently the dark figure waits and watches until the manager leaves the empty parking lot. Leaving his headlights off he drives closer to the store entrance and exits his jeep. He looks both ways assuring himself no one else is around and approaches metal mesh gate knowing it would be locked he reaches towards the gate lock and positions his hand over it and within seconds it begins to disintegrate leaving a faint mist that is absorbed through the skin of his palm, a gaping hole is left where the lock was, leaving the edges not sharp but smooth to the touch and the gate loosens and lifts a little at the bottom raising itself. He proceeds to lift it higher up and above the the glass door lock and this time he places his hand on the glass door close to the lock, the glass is absorbed through his skin, instantly he feels the added weight of the metal mesh and glass added to himself. His first thought was the hidden safe, he knows where its at in the managers office and proceeds to quickly to it. Of course it was locked so he put his hand on the combination wheel and slowly it disintegrates and again absorbed. The safe opens revealing the coinage and cash set for the morning shift, he quickly stuffs it into the sack he had in his other hand, he added the personal items of the manager that he stored for safekeeping. When he finished with the safe he went into the store choosing the most expensive laptop, gather the appropriate accessories and upgrades. He knew what he was look for and was quick at it, and when he finished he stopped at the countered and hesitated. He put down the laptop, accessories, and sack and thinking for a second he holds his hands close together and slowly a glowing glob of glass metallic metal rotated and slowly it st formed into a perfect sculptor image of the manager in glass and metal. This was his trademark. he gathered everything, left the store and left in his jeep

1131.content:
As soon as you get out of the hospital you go home and spend the entire day in bed with a splitting headache. It was the worst headache ever, it felt like a total migraine. Luckily, it was over the next day, just in time for you to return to school.

The next day, things were really weird the minute you got up. As you showered and got dressed, you went into the kitchen where you saw your mom making coffee.

“Oh gosh I need to hurry up or else I'll be late...” your mother said to you, as you walked in.

“Hey mom...”

“Oh no he's wearing that ugly old black t-shirt again...” you hear your mother's voice saying.

“What did you say?” you say to her.

“I didn't say anything... Other than I'm running late...” mom responded.

“Oh...”

“Honey.... Do you have to wear that old shirt?” mom finally said to you.

“I like this shirt, mom!” you respond.

“The shirt has completely colored in the wash...” you hear your mother's voice say in your mind.

“You really don't want me to go to school with this shirt, do you?” you say.

“It just looks...” she begins.

“I know... It has colored in the wash!” you announce.

Your mom stared at you with a surprised look on her face.

“How did he know that?” you hear your mom thinking in your mind.

“Okay, I'll go change...” you groan.

You go change shirts and you put on another shirt before you walk back into the kitchen. The smile on mom's face says everything.

“Bye, mom!”

You catch the bus to school, where you realize that there are a lot more voices you end up hearing than just mom's...

You take a seat on the bus next to your best friend. You stare at him for a second unsure of how you are going to tell him about your amazing powers. He scowels at you, you have been staring blankly at him a little too long.

"Sorry," you mumble. Then you remember what you were going to say.
"Hey, Jake," you say too him, "You will never guess what I found out."

He doesn't exactly seam thrilled at the prospect of having to listen to a speel from you about whatever. You manage to pick this up from his thoughts but also from the general huff after you speak. "I wish he would just get lost," you hear him think. You fold your arms and frown. You are not happy with him.

He glowers at you then finally think, "ok maybe he has something important to say this time." You are still annoyed at him, do you still tell him or find someone who cares?

1132.content:
After you gotten home from the hospital, you were feeling very light-headed and sick. You got something to eat and you immediately went to sleep afterwards, since you weren't feeling well at all. You figure that whatever had struck you, had messed up your system and you needed to get some rest to recover from some sickness. You got in your room and crawled in bed early, sleeping through the night clear until morning.

When the alarm went off at 6 o'clock the next morning, you rolled around in bed, as you normally would do. However, you noticed something really odd. Even though you were holding on to the pillow with both hands, as you always did, you couldn't feel the sheets or the mattress under you. The sheets and the covers were still draped over your chest, but something felt strange.

As you slowly turned around, the covers suddenly fell from your back and shoulders, leaving your entire body exposed. Luckily, you were wearing your pajama's, otherwise you would have felt cold. Again, you couldn't feel the mattress under your torso. It almost felt like you were sleeping on air.

Then you opened your eyes. Yes, your bed was still there. You were still in your room. Your sheet and covers had fallen to the floor. However... You were hovering three feet above your bed!

“Huh? What the---” you moan as you rub your eyes and look down. “Where's my bed?”

Then, it dawned on you. You spent the entire night sleeping while hovering suspended in the air about three feet above your bed! In other words, you were flying all night long! You're floating like a balloon!

“WHOA!” you gasp, as it dawns on you that you're three feet away from the carpeted floor.

“I need to get down!” you say to yourself, as you drop your pillow to the floor. “How did I get up here?”

“You try to imagine your body landing with your feet first on the floor right by your bed. It begins to succeed at first, as your body slowly descends to the floor. Your toes are sticking out, facing to the carpet, and they gently touch down on the carpet. You breathe a sigh of relief, as you made your first landing.

“This is weird! I guess I gained the ability to fly or something!” you wonder out loud.

You feel an intense pressure building in your chest, which almost seems like your powers to go flying needed to be tested and soon. You take two steps towards your dresser when you suddenly begin to hover above the ground once again!

“Oh man! I'm airborne again!” you gasp, realizing that your feet had left the ground.

For the second time around, you concentrate on lending on the floor. This time, it works out a little easier than the first time, and you land on the ground. But, as soon as you begin to walk towards your closet, your body wants to take flight again.

“Okay, I guess I'll need to fly around a bit...” you sigh, as you extend your arms above your head.

Your body lifts up off the ground and starts to float around the room. The tingling pressure in your chest immediately decreases and you feel much better right away.

You fly two circles around your room, and you finally touch down next to your bed.

“Dang! I can fly! This is freakish! It's cool, but freakish!”

From this point forward, you got no problem staying on the ground. But you know what to look out for, and to be ready to take off and to fly around now and then, especially when that odd tingling feeling comes back in your chest!

You're not ready yet to fly around at school, but flying home when school was over begins to sound like a great idea...

113321.content:
You're completely in awe of your mental powers, but the extent of your powers don't become apparent until you look over and realize an oncoming car that is about to hit two kids, who were just crossing the street, just on the other side of the public park where you're at!

“Oh no...” you scream. “Stop... STOP!”

Suddenly, just like you commanded, the kids were frozen in their stride. They no longer moved from where they were walking. Their gazes were completely fixed in front of them. Their arms, legs and feet no longer moved. They were in complete suspended animation. Likewise, the oncoming car was completely frozen as well. The driver could no longer move and the car was completely at a standstill, remaining in the middle of the street, just a few feet away from the two boys who were crossing the street without even seeing the car as it came towards them.

The only person who wasn't frozen was you.

“Whoa... Did I just do that?” you wonder, as you see the frozen car and the two boys in front of you. “Those two boys shouldn't be in the street right now. They should be walking over here, in the park, on the sidewalk!”

You snap your fingers and the two boys instantly disappear from where they were standing in the middle of the street. A fraction of a second later, they were standing on the sidewalk, close to you, where they were several yards away from the traffic and safely removed from the dangerous cars. They were still holding the same position as before, but you had teleported them to a different location while they were still in the suspended state!

“Okay... I guess the boys are safe now...” you sigh. “I think everybody can continue to move around again... GO!” you command.

The car kept on moving down the street. Only this time, the boys were no longer walking in the middle of the street. Rather, the two boys were walking a few yards away, on the paved sidewalk, thanks to your amazing powers!

“That was totally cool!” you grin, as the two boys walked right past you, never realizing that they had been teleported and frozen in time for a brief minute. You begin to realize how powerful you had become, since you were able to teleport anyone just about anywhere you wanted to. Not only that, but you could stop time just about anywhere you wished as well!

What would you do next?

You vanish from the spot where you were standing and you pop up standing right in front of the boy! You teleported again!

"Whoa!" the boy gasps. "Jake! Where did you come from?"

"yeah..."

You instantly teleport yourself and Alex to the shopping mall. Both of you pop up before the entrance, where you see the list of movies. You decide on which movie you want to see. Then you teleport into the theater where the movie is showing without paying a dime...

113321111.content:
You and Alex walk around the mall and see a big guy bullying a younger kid.

"Watch this!" you say to Alex.

You stop time, freezing the two boys in front of you.

Then you teleport the bully to the opposite end of the large shopping mall, in the boy's bathroom! Finally, you unfreeze time by snapping your fingers. It's that easy.

"Hey! How the heck did I get here?" the bully shouted.

1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.content:
Man oh man is Chemistry boring. The only fun part about it is when you can mix different chemicals together and change the color. But, I think I'm getting off topic. My name is Scott Parsons. I'm six feet tall exactly, never by an inch. I have silver hair, not gray, silver. My eyes are a strange yellow. My build is not that good. I wasn't the weakest kid in school, but I wasn't the strongest either. Anyway, Chemistry was probably the most BORING class ever. I only had one friend in there and his name was Baron. He was actually the rich kid, but he's not a snotty stuck-up brat like usual rich kids are. He had blonde hair and blue eyes. The bell finally rung and we were leaving.

"Mr. Parsons...hold up a moment..." said the teacher.

The teacher's name was Mr. Wallace. He wasn't that bad of a teacher, but he could really talk. I actually seen at least three kids fall asleep in his class! He has brown hair and eyes covered behind glasses. "Mr. Parsons, I would like you to get some beakers from my lab please" he said. "I am aware that this is your lunch period, but if I recall in class you say you never eat school lunches. Now go on, get to it!"

I sighed and entered the labs through the double door connected to his room. I don't know why he couldn't have gotten these himself. I was about to go back when I noticed a faint glow emitting from the bottom of a door. I never even knew there was a door there. I walked over and tried to open it. It wouldn't budge. I pressed against the door using my body and tried again. This time, I got it open. But, I was flung in from the amount of force I put on the door. I went head first into a shelf with several different chemicals contained. All of them fell on me, mixing as they fell. I thought by body would be eaten away, but I only felt a tingling sensation.
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.title: It was an Accident...

1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.content:
Nothing happened to me. Nothing happened to my clothes. I was completely fine despite my shower of different chemicals. The shelf, however, had me pinned down. Mr. Wallace walked in and helped remove the shelf. "What were you doing in here?!" he asked slightly yelling. I got up and tried to squeeze the remaining chemicals from my clothes, "I saw a light in here and I wondered what it was. The door was jammed so I pushed against it...and I think you can tell the rest. What was that light?"

Mr. Wallace walked over and simply pointed to the light bulb illuminateing the room. I felt so embarrassed, but then I remembered the chemicals. "What were in those beakers?"

"I am not sure myself" he replied. "I discovered this room a few days ago. I tried to identify what they were but they seem unnatural."

I got cleaned up, but I was excused from school early. Mr. Wallace wanted to make sure I was okay, so he demanded for me to go home and shower this stuff off. Problem was, I think my skin absorbed some of it. But, I'm not complaining. I got to go home early on a Friday! My house wasn't far from the school and I always rode my bike. I never wore a helmet, I never needed it. I peddled along and slowly made my way back home. I had to stop a couple of times to let cars pass down the intersections, but it wasn't that bad. I was nearly home when I heard a slight fizzle. My bike started to wobble and by back tire exploded. I tried to slam on the brakes but they launched me forward. I was heading straight for a light post. I prepared for impact but I felt nothing. I opened my eyes and saw that I was on the ground. I stood up and looked at the pole. There was a huge dent in it and the light above flickered.

Wha...what happened? Did...did I...do THAT?!

I grabbed my bike and walked the rest of the way home. I put my damaged bike in my garage and headed inside. I immediately took a shower, but I couldn't get that incident out of my head. I knew some people called me thick skilled, but I know I'm not THAT thick skulled. I dried myself off and put a clean pair of clothes on. Mr. Wallace said that I should burn my old clothes, and I didn't want him to say that for nothing. I did that with no problem at all. As I headed back, I passed my house's chimmney. I knocked on it, feeling how hard it was. I hit my head, and not only heard, but felt a metallic surface. Then, my back started to feel funny.
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.title: Don't Need a Helmet Anymore

choices: Your friend arrives after you call
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.content:
I believe this was a problem, so I immediately ran inside. I went to the upstairs bathroom and took my shirt. What I saw scared me. My back had a gray tint to it. It wasn't skin, it was armor! The mirror wasn't foggy or anything, my back was actually armor! They seemed to be plated because I could still bend over and back up again. However something else also seemed to be forming on the overlaps. I tried to not think about it, but what if they were something dangerous. Right on that thought, solid steel spikes shot out from them. They were about three inches in length and about a inch in diameter. There were at least three per plate of armor. I tried to put my shirt down, but the spikes pierced through the fabric. I had no idea what was happening to me. It was those chemicals! They did this! I couldn't call a doctor or Mr. Wallace, I would be turned in and he would be fired. But, I knew who I could call.

I ran out of the bathroom but tripped down the stairs. I curled up to ease the pain, but I felt nothing. I looked around and saw that I was at the bottom of the stairs. Although, everything seemed taller. I stood up to find my shirt in shreads. I ignored that fact and headed for the house phone. On a note beside the phone, it said: "Gone for the weekend. Don't wreck the house while we're gone." I disliked the fact that they couldn't trust me, but I loved them. I was about to grab the phone when I felt this sharp pain in my arm. Then, it happened to the rest of my body.

"What's....happening...to me....?" I grunted in pain.

I could feel it, cold metal rushing through my body like blood. My arms began to form thick plateing. My hands slowly being covered in the same substance. I not only felt my chest getting harder, but also bigger. It seemed that I was gaining a little bit of muscle as well. My chest now seemed like armor, shining in the daylight from the window. My legs became metal too. My feet were solidified into metal as my toe became small claws. The pain faded from my body, but rushed straight to my head. It was too great, I passed out from the pain.

By the time I woke up, my entire body felt numb. I tried to stand up, but my limbs were too weak. I looked at my hands, completely metal with small claws tipped on my fingers. But, something felt different. It was my head, something was on my head. I lifted a hand to touch it. A sound was made; like metal touching metal. Good thing the phone was on the ground, because I was freaking out!
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.title: Armored Up

1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.content:
After my metalmorphosis(bad pun I know) I called Baron. He's the only kid I know that can leave school earlier than anyone else. One, because he was rich and two, because he was ridiculously smart. I wore a baggy sweatshirt and sweatpants to hide my mutation. I hope that Baron would still be my friend. I've seen this like a million times in stories over the internet. Someone changed completely, and then their family, friends, and everyone else decides to forget about him/her forever. I glanced through my window and saw Baron running up the driveway. I put my hood up as soon as he entered.

"Dude, what they did to ya?!" he asked. I already told him about the chemicals. But one change made him stop in his tracks. "Dude...you got taller!"

Yeah, apparently along with my extra muscle I gained some height as well. I sighed, "Baron, what happened to me is...different then what you think. You need to promise me that you won't yell or inform the police." Baron backed up a little, "Can I at least get a hint of how bad it is?" I pulled up my sleeve, revealing my new hand. My hand was covered in metal and my fingers were claws. This made Baron gasp, but he seemed alright. I began to pull off my sweatshirt. I hoped that Baron wouldn't bolt for the door. The sweatshirt was completely off, revealing my mutations. One thing I forgot to mention was my head. My skin was metal, but it had this design. Around my forehead and lower neck area looked something like a helmet. Down my neck were these plates that overlapped. My eyes were all yellow and my teeth were shiny and pointed.

"Dude...that's awesome!" shouted Baron. "You look like a superhero!"

I shot him a look, "Since when does this remind you of a superhero?!"

"It kinda reminds me of that one show with alien heroes and..."

"THAT'S A TV SHOW!"

My voice shook the house, knocking a few things over. One item was the television remote and turned it on. It was on the news station. "This is just in, we have a bank robbery in progress dowtown" said the newswoman. "The Fourth Street Bank was activated into complete lockdown from the inside. Local authorities cannot get inside or determine what the robbers want. But they are assuming that they are trying to get into the bank's reserves. Local authorities are trying their best but they cannot get past the thick steel doors blocking the entrance. There are reported hostages..."

Baron shut the TV off and looked at me. "Dude! This is perfect!" he exclaimed. "You can save those people!"

"I don't know..."

He walked up to me and tried to put his face near mine to look threatening, "There are hostages dude. HOSTAGES! Your telling me your willing to stay here and let them die?!"
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.title: Pagan Dr. Rich Kid

1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.content:
I exhaled loudly, "No, you're right..." Baron looked quite pleased with himself. "But Fourth Street is miles from here! How am I supposed to lug this two ton body over there in time?"

For some strange reason, my back spikes sank in. Baron took notice of this, his face flashed with an idea. "Dude, try rolling into a ball!" I had no time to argue, so I began to curl up. My vision never changed, only I was looking at my friend by a lower view. Although his face was filled with shock, "Dude...your as big as a freakin wrecking ball!"

I opened up and headed for the door. However Baron stopped me. "Put this in your...wait...do you even have an ear?" I grabbed it and placed it there. I had no time to lose, I ran out the door, rolled up, and went off.

-------------------

Fourth Street Bank looked like the Greek Parthenon, only with more metal. The doors and the windows were blocked entirely with metal. Policemen and firemen were at the doors, trying to find a way inside. The hero stayed in the alleyway, away from the police cars and people.

"Testing testing, 1 2 3..."

"Baron, is that you?"

"NO, I AM YOUR FATHER." The Darth Vader voice was funny but unneeded. "Sorry dude, yeah it's me. This earpiece will allow me to contact you for some help."

"Cool. So, is there anywhere on the outside I can get to? I don't think I could ring the doorbell and walk in unharmed."

"Hold on....okay. The only thing untouched by the lockdown is the skylight. Get up there and you'll be good."

"Alright, thanks m-"

"Whoa whoa man! You're forgetting two things..."

"What?"

"A name...and a grand entrance."

The hero looked up, "I have an idea..."

----------------

Policemen were forcing the crowd back. The last thing they needed were more civilians getting hurt. A few screams caught their attention, right before a giant silver ball fell into the street with sheer force. The ball unfurled, revealing the hero. The crowd was silent as it looked across the crowd. Each step it took caused a tiny shake. "Excuse me officers" he said, "But I'll need to borrow your car."

The officer took no time in getting away. The hero picked up the car with ease, flipped it, and laid it at an angle over another. The hero then ran back before rolling into a ball. The ball rolled forward, flew off the car like a ramp, and headed towards the side of the bank. At the last second, several spikes formed on the outside, allowing the hero to stick to the wall. He slowly rolled up to the top until he landed on the roof. The spikes retracted as he unfurled from the ball.

"Alright, I'm on the roof."

"Dude, be careful" Baron said. "There's like four guys in there heavily armed."

The hero nodded, jumping right before he curled into a ball. He smashed straight through the skylight.

----------------

"Come on! Hurry up!" Several men were trying to get into the vault. Two men were standing guard while two held guns facing the hostages. One in particular was a little girl. The tallest one seemed to be the one in charge. "You idiots better get into that vault soon! Otherwise the rest of us will get larger portions!"

The sound of smashing glass caught their attention. A giant silver ball crashed into the floor, sending a wave of cracks everywhere. The hero unfolded from his state. "Stop this now and release the hostages!" he shouted.

The two guards pulled their guns out and fired. The hero turned his back to them. The bullets bounced off his back and hit the guards. But luckily it just hit their arms. They dropped as the ball rolled towards the others. Silver spikes fired from his body, pinning the two armed men to the wall.

"Stop right there metal head!" The hero turned to consult the insulter. However, he had to stop. The leader held a gun in one hand, and the little girl in the other. "Now you have two options here. Either one, stop now and let me go with the money. Or, you can continue being a hero and the little girl dies! Your choice hero..."
1133322222222222222222222222222222222212.title: Anyone Call for a Hero?

You lie on your back for what seems like a year, fortunately you have your watch to keep you right, its been 10 minutes, who could have known doing nothing was so boring. 1221.content:
You are an average fourteen year old girl who about a week ago that was the normal for you. Last week however something inside you had changed you can't remember how or even why it was happening. All you knew was that somehow you had become far different than you ever had been. You went to your parents and asked them about it, but unfortunately they gave no answers to you. It wasn't until you smashed the alarm clock and your end table the next morning when you first discovered you had Super Strength!

You were amazed at your strength and power and even became invigorated at using it to get what ever you could want. You could literally be anything! The first thing you decided to do after that was get dressed and show your best friend your new found powers surely she too would be amazed at your awesome power as well! There was just one problem though, you had no control over your power and wound up breaking everything you touched from the door, to the bathroom faucets and even your dad's car which you thought was a piece of junk anyway. Slowly as time passed you began to realize that having these powers may not be as great as you would think.

You go towards your best friend Rebecca Star. She had blond hair blue eyes was about five foot six feet tall and you and her had known each other since you were little. You try to knock as carefully as you can as you didn't want to damage her door, but still had little to no control over your own strength yet. It was her mother who answered the door.

" Hello, Is Rebecca Home?" You ask.

" Yes, she is come right in, recently she's been keeping to herself a bit more than usual though. I don't know what's gotten in to that girl, maybe you can help." Her mom said letting you inside her house. It was shortly after that you went towards Rebecca's room and knocked on the door.

" Rebecca it's me! You can open up." You tell her.

" No! You can't see me like this! I'm a freak!" Rebecca yelled. The freak comment suggested that something has happened to her, something she's afraid of. Yet you knew you had to go see her to see what it was that was going on.

" Rebecca you're not a freak! What ever it was that's bothering you or changed you I'm sure we can get through it together! I have changed somewhat as well, Here I'm coming in!" You tell her and come in the door and that is when you first see Rebecca and the changes she has gone through. You just woke up to having super strength one day ago, but your friend Rebecca now had cat ears and a cat tail as well as the reflexes of a cat and very sharp claws!

She was amazed to see your strength but as you saw her sitting in the corner of the room afraid of everyone judging her for how she looked, you caressed her as gently as you could and held her in your arms. " Rebecca! Just cause your like this doesn't make you any less of yourself, You are still my best friend and always will be!"

" Thanks, I need that, but I think you need to learn to control your strength your still hugging too tight I can't breathe." Rebecca said. You quickly remove your arms from Rebecca allowing her to breathe once more. The week passed on and Rebecca began homeschooling still afraid of what people would think about her look. During that week you discovered to teenager all over the world were beginning to have powers but there was no reason or explanation of why. You and Rebecca for that past week had been working on that mystery.

You missed Rebecca w hen you had to go to school but you also knew that she needed time before she was more comfortable with her changes. It was during today a week after you gained your superpowers when you first heard of....
1221.title: Super Strength

choices: You arrive at school one day to see Rebecca getting picked on
Your family is visited by an unknown organisation
12213.content: It wasn't long after this that your parents found out about your powers, it was inevitable, what with everything that was going on with the world, all of the super powered individuals had attracted a lot of attention on the news. You expected them to be fearful, or wary of your powers, but now you knew that your parents really did love you. You also found out who your true friends were in the next few days. After the hubbub had died down, the world continued as normal. Rebecca was told to return to school, as well as many of the other students that had disappeared from school over the last few days. The school counsellor was kept very busy, seeing students both with powers and without that were trying to cope with the new situation. The counsellor had sent a letter home to your parents, recommending a monastery in the nearby hills. She thought that being able to keep your mind focused, you would be able to keep yourself from hurting someone accidentally, as you had come close to doing several times already, in school and at home. So you trained, after school every day for months, feeling more and more focused. As a side effect of being around the monastery, you also picked up much of the martial prowess of the monks that made their home there. You even manage to persuade a sword master at the temple to teach you how to use a blade, if only that the constant practice would help her maintain her focus, even outside of the monastery.
12213.title: Something Else

choices: The Day  Gets a bit better
You finally lose your temper at a bully
122131.content:
One day later you arrived at school only for you to see some people picking on Rebecca because of how she looked. Most people just ran from you, but with her it's like they always had to find a way to pick on her. Each time you heard there insults it made you angrier and angrier but you also knew you had to restrain from seriously hurting anyone.

" Aw, Poor little Kitty all alone! Go back to your litter box you freak!" This one was heard quite a bit from Rebecca she was getting used to it. But still not liking all the attention she got just cause her powers made her look more like a cat.

" Yeah, After all you are the cat's meow in your alley! We don't need a freaky geek like you here!" Another of the bullies said. The one from this bully from her tone you could tell Rebecca was hurt by this, as the girl who said this was one of hers and your former friends you didn't know if she was jealous of you two, or just plain mean cause you two had changed. By now though you had enough and decided to stop these bullies before Rebecca feels any worst.

" You two leave my friend alone! She doesn't deserve to be treated like that!" You tell them. Unfortunately the school bullies now that you would get in trouble if you voluntarily hit them so instead of stopping they start picking on you instead. " This is none of your business ox woman! You should just abandon her it would make your life so much easier."

" I don't abandon my friends! And I'm not an ox. Now Apologize to her now!" You demanded.

" We don't have to listen to you, so we don't need to apologize to anyone. Why what are you going to do throw us down like the brutish thug you are?!" The Other bully said, it was at this point you decided if they weren't going to apologize then it would be best to walk away before you blow your temper.

" If you don't apologize you may end up regretting it. Are you okay Rebecca?" You asked looking at Rebecca.

" I wish I could just go home school for the entire year, why did my parents have to tell me to go back to regular school? It's hard enough as it is at home. My parents hardly look at me anymore." Rebecca replied.

" I am sure this is new to them as well, it will take them time to get used to it as well." You said. This cheered up Rebecca a bit so far she's had it hard and you had your training at the monastery as well in order to maintain control which occupies some of the time you could spend with Rebecca. The two of you go to your class hoping the day would get better as so far it's been nothing but bullies and people picking on anyone who's out of the ordinary.
122131.title: Bullies and Restraints

1221311.content:
You and Rebecca walked back to Rebecca ' s house together. You had decided to have a talk with Rebeccas parents about what Rebecca had told you. You brought them all together in the living room.
"I don't know what's gotten into everyone," you said "I've always held you two in high regard, but then you turn away from your own daughter just because she looks a little different? That's not who you are. Look at your daughter."
Rebeccas parents turned to look at her.
"She's still your little girl, and if you can't see that, you're going to lose her."
1221311.title: The Day  Gets a bit better

122132.content: It was a few months later. Your training had honed your powers, and you were able to hold and touch things without breaking them. While Rebecca didn't need the same training as you did, she came to visit you everyday to keep you company. After you had honed your powers until you could function in society without hurting anyone, you even sparred with Rebecca, who's cat-like reflexes made up for her lack of training, and slowly she began to surpass you in skill. You had to use a little more of your strength each day, to present more of a challenge to Rebecca, and as Rebecca improved, so did you, your control over your powers honed as your mind was focused on the training the monks had given you. When you finally felt safe enough to face the world, you left the monastery. Rebecca walked with you on the way home, talking about normal things, as if you were normal sixteen year old girls again. You stopped talking as you saw an unmarked black van parked outside your front gate.
122132.title: Your family is visited by an unknown organisation

choices: You Notice Rebecca has a Crush on one the Guys
You agree to sign up as long as you get to name the team.
1221321.content:
You look carefully and see from what you could tell the people from the van seem to be government agents. The only reason you are able to tell is due to the fact that on the news you've heard the government has visited a few families hear and there in unmarked vehicles. The reason for the visit for the most part has remained largely unknown. Deciding to see what is going on you and Rebecca go on inside to your house.

" Greetings, We've been waiting for you two." One of the man says as he offers you a seat. " I hope you two have been doing well, do not worry we are not here for any more tests. In fact we would like to know if you would like to be part of a project we have in mind."

" What kind of project?" You ask curious as to what the men in the suits are asking of you.

" It is simple a job where you help us catch some of the more notorious super powered teens. These teenagers not only refused to submit a blood sample but also have hurt several people along the way. Some of them are even beginning to start there own criminal organizations. We need your help to subdue these people so they can be brought to justice." The man explained.

" Basically you want us to be our own Super Hero team?" Rebecca asks.

" That's the gist of it, however you will be paid for your work and you will continue to get an education as well." The man said.

" Continue? You mean by saying yes, we will be joining a different school altogether?" You asked.

The man simply nods. " Yes, some people fear having people with powers in there school so to separate them into a different school would be much more ideal, especially one that knows what you are going to have to do."

" I Don't know that seems odd. Why can't we just keep our old school you don't have to segregate us." You told the man in the suit.

" It is not Segregation! We are merely telling you that it's for your own good!" The man in the suit yelled, obviously getting angry at your comment. It was then that the other man in the suit began to speak.

" I'll put it simply, the government is planning to pass a law that all super powered people are to work under there supervision. When this law passes it will enforce you to change schools to a place where only Super powered teens are. We are simply offering you a chance to become a Team before the law passes. Luckily this law will only go for high school, and not for college." The other man in the suit told you.

" Do you have others who have agreed to your terms?" You ask.

" Why yes, In fact we do three boys in fact all around your age. Unfortunately only two of them are here today. Each one has a superpower that is quite different from yours in fact. Why don't we let them come out." The man in the suit said and then he signaled for two boys to come out.

" Hello I am Keith Silo. I recently joined the group due to well various circumstances. A few months ago I found out my powers. To put it in the simplest terms I am a Speedster. I am quick on my feet as well as quite intelligent as well." Keith said. Keith was six feet and two inches tall had brown hair and blue eyes. He wasn't the most muscular of the guys you've seen but the second you saw him run you knew he was telling the truth about him being a Speedster. It wasn't long after Keith came out that the next guy came out.

The next teenage boy had red hair, blue eyes and appeared to be five foot nine inches tall. " Greetings My name is Hansel Bask. Unlike my friend here I am not a Speedster. I am a Shape Shifter. I can change my shape to be anyone or anything." Hansel said. You now had saw the other two team members of the team you would be on. The only other guy you had yet to meet was the third one and you didn't even know what the name of the team was yet.
1221321.title: Job Offer You Can't Refuse

The room was moderately sized, the two beds, side by side, making it look a lot smaller, over the front of the room, next to the window is a desk, where you currently sit. 122132122.content:
With your friend Rebecca's suggestion you decided to take a break from all the name thinking for your first team. Fortunately it wasn't too long before you had to go to your first class. You looked upon your schedule and saw that you had several classes, some were specified towards your strength and others were quite different. However you noticed that the first class on your list was Rescue and First Aid training. Both you and Rebecca as well as Kyle and Hansel were in this class, but the leader of your team whom you have yet to meet apparently wasn't there.

" Do you think this Class is really necessary? I mean haven't we all learned basic first aid before?" You asked.

" Just wait and see, trust me when I say that even if you learned something, there may be other things you never even thought about." Kyle answered. It was then the teacher came in.

" Greetings, I am Mr. Daniels I will be your Rescue and First Aid instructor. Now first off let's get this started, I am not super powered or have any powers. However I do believe that while your powers can be effective they can also cause great harm if you don't think about your actions when performing First aid. I understand that some of you have already had basic first aid training. I can assure you that in my class you will be learning a lot more than just fighting bad guys. Unlike your next class. Now I will pick you for a demonstration." Mr. Daniels said pointing towards you.

" Me? What do you need me to do?" You asked.

" I want you to perform basic mouth to mouth on this dummy." Mr. Daniels said. " Just do it as you normally would. You didn't understand exactly what he was intending at first but as you did the basic mouth to mouth and breathing life into the dummy you began to press the abdominal area to where you would expel the water. However instead of expelling the water you ended up crushing the bones of the dummy.
122132122.title: Rescue and First Aid training

1221321222.content:
You heard a slow, sarcastic clapping from the door. You turned to see an older boy standing there. He wore dark glasses and a suit. As you watched, he split down the middle as a second boy was created, and then a third, all of them still clapping in perfect synchronicity. There were six of him now, and they surrounded you, maintaining the slow clap.

"Great job, new kid," he said, his voice dripping with sarcasm. Then, his voice came from one of his other duplicates "You killed the civilian." His voice kept jumping around between different copies "What would you have done if that was a real situation? How would this make you different from any of the ones we want to take down? You think just because you're special, you can do whatever you want? If you wanted to, you could walk into a bank and rip open a vault with your bare hands."

You sank to the ground, as he berated you, you had no idea where the voice would come from next, and this was giving you a headache. Eventually, you couldn't take it anymore. You yelled incoherently, and slammed both your hands down on the ground, creating a shockwave that hit all the copies, destroying all but one, which was pushed backwards a few feet.

"This is the best you could do with the new recruits?" asked the boy "A loose cannon and a freak? I'd rather go it alone."
He turned, and walked out of the room.
You immediately looked to Rebecca, her tears barely kept back as the boy had insulted her. You ran to her, as she collapsed in your arms, the tears finally falling from her eyes.

122332.title: Invulnerability

1223321.content:
Behind the football field behind a small local school group of six seniors were gathered around a large man with a crooked busy selling them a large bag of meth as they negotiated the price.

“Come on!” the school’s football captain growled, “Give us the stuff!”

“Sorry boys, prices have gone up,” the dealer said flashing his smile, “Someone’s been cracking down on trade lately, it’s getting harder to buy the stuff to give to you boys. Now maybe if you help get some new customers I might be able to lower the price a bit, but otherwise the price stands.”

“How sickening,” someone laughed from above them.

Looking up the six boys and dealer saw a woman, maybe sixteen years old with moderate length auburn hair wearing blue jeans and a tank top looking down at them from the top of the bleachers snapping a picture with her camera phone. She chuckled from behind the clay fox mask she wore as she said with a smirk in her voice, “Evidence.”

“Quick you idiots get her before she runs away!” the dealer shouted.

They started to move only to be shocked as the girl leapt off the bleachers aiming to land on the face of one of the boys who easily side stepped the attack. The girl landed feet first on the concrete showing no signs that the twenty foot fall had affected her at all as she struck one of the stunned seniors in the throat before kicking him in the crotch and finishing with a blow to the back of the neck.

“Damn bitch!” one of the seniors shouted grabbing the girl’s hair and punching her hard in the back of the head.

The girl turned to face the senior with a small chuckle saying, “You’re next.”

She quickly twisted the boy’s arm enough to dislocate it before she broke it, the pain made the boy pass out. One of the seniors ran as the bone pierced flesh and blood flowed freely from his friend’s wound.

“Stupid kids,” the dealer snarled drawing a knife, “Just kill her!”

He slammed the knife down hard between the girl’s shoulder and neck, a blow that should have deflated a lung and cut and artery. The knife struck her and bounced off like it hit a rock, the girls eyes laughed at him as she broke his knee and smashed his head into walls. One of the boys kicked her knees out from her and grabbed both of her wrists before placing his foot on her back.

“I know some martial arts,” the senior chuckled, “Your trapped now; there is no escape from this hold. Chuck, fuck her up.”

“Gladly,” the football captain said cracking his knuckles.

“How foolish,” the girl chuckled seeming unconcerned that she was about to be attacked by one of the biggest people in the school.

“Fuck you,” Chuck growled slamming his elbow into the girl’s throat, kicking her gut, and kicking her chin like he would a football. Aside from cracking the mask, the girl didn’t respond to the attack.

“Is that it?” the girl asked laughter and a hint of madness in her eyes.

She stood up despite the senior pushing down on her; he twisted her arms in a way that should have dislodged both her shoulders, nothing. She did a neat backflip over the senior’s shoulders and choked him into unconsciousness with his own arms. Chuck had taken off running and was too far away to catch.

The masked girl sighed before asking, “Did you get that Liz?”

“I got it Mindy,” a young blonde, maybe fifteen at most said climbing out from behind the fence she’d been hiding behind, “Got some good pictures, I was worried that you might not win this one.”

“If they’d played smart and just grabbed me as a group I wouldn’t have, but they were all stupid people who think with their dicks,” the masked girl said picking up one of the boy’s phones and sending it the picture she’d taken earlier before sending it to the police with the name of the school and location as well as a recommendation they send an ambulance.

“We better get out of here,” Mindy said removing her mask, “Police will be here soon and they don’t like vigilantes.”
1223321.title: The Invulnerable Girl

"Lets test it" said Will. He took a match from his pocket, struck it, blew it out, and then held it near to you. The match re lit. "You do create your own oxygen" said Will "That means you can breathe underwater and in space" "What would be the point of breathing underwater?" you ask "I control fire, that wouldn't be much help underwater" "Can you extend your oxygen shield?" asked Violet. You try willing the shield to expand. Will tested it with his matches. The matches wouldn't go out. Whenever he blew them out they re lit. They take you up the passage and into what looked like an ordinary office. You knew from movies that spy headquarters are never what they seem. 12312111121111111212121111.content:
You and Jack fly up, you extending your oxygen shield around both of you. You tune the laptop to your goggles and put it away. You quickly locate a security camera and switched to infa red. "Will, I see a potential gun man, black t shirt, blue jeans, moustache, check him out, over" you say. You watch in infa red as Will steps out of the crowd and found no guns "He's clean" said Will. Suddenly, five armed men came on the scene. You switch your goggles back to normal. "I see the assassins" you say "Will you try and stop the bullets from hitting the prime minister, Jack, you need to get the prime minister out of here" You watch on the video screen as a man with a bomb came on the scene. "Stop!" you shout, but you know it's too late to change your orders now. You engulf in fire and fly down as fast as you can. You torch several of the guns with precision so as not to ignite the bomb. you land next to the bomber. You look at the bomb. There is a red wire, a black wire and a blue wire along with a lot of complicated twists and dials. There was also a timer counting down, 5 minutes. "MI5 how do i defuse this bomb" you say over the comm. You hear a calm voice on the other end. "give us a view on it" You quickly switch your goggles to visual. There was a pause. "Snip the blue wire" You take out a pocket knife and snip the wire. "Now the black" You snip the black wire. "Now press the button three from the right on the fifth row" You press the button. The timer on the bomb winks off and the bomb falls silent. You look around at the other assassins. The suicide bomber did not look as if he was part of the assassins group.

"Will, trap them with your psychic ability" you said. Will used his psychic ability to trap all the assassins.

"Sam finished the costumes, we should be able to pick them up tomorrow" said Abbie "Did you happen to get a look at who's following you?" "No" you reply "It was too dark" "See you tomorrow" she said, and hung up. A few miles away, a small message was displayed on a phone screen inside a black car. "Call trace complete"

123212211112112111111.content: You are woken by the frantic ringing of your doorbell. You stagger downstairs and look through the spyhole. Sam was waiting outside. You open the door and usher her inside. In the brief time that the door was open, you realised that the black car, which had been present the other night, had vanished. Sam looked out of breath, as if she had just finished a marathon. "What's up, Sam, it looks like you just chased a cheetah across half the world" you asked. "Abbie's been kidnapped" she said, still trying to catch her breath. "What!" you asked, frantically. "I know, why would anyone want to kidnap Abbie?" said Sam "Her parents aren't overly wealthy, the only reason that I could think of was that her kidnapping had something to do with her powers" "We have to go" you say "You can't go home, Sam, they saw us at your house, so they might try and capture you to get to us" "O.K" said Sam. "Just let me grab a few things, and we'll go" you say. You rush upstairs and grab a bag. You pack your essentialsm and some of your sisters clothes for Sam, and then headed back downstairs. "Let's go" you say "Out the back" You leave by the back door with Sam following close behind. "Over the fence" you say, lacing your fingers together to give her a boost. She steps into your palms and you push her up. You then scramble up yourself. You both jump onto the other side. "Let's go" you say, leading a way around the house over the fence from yours and into the street. You were on the run.

1232122111121121111111.content: Night. You and Sam are hiding in a bush when the same black car comes past. "That's the kidnappers car" you whisper "We have to follow them" "Follow me" said Sam, leading you to the road. She comes up next to a car and brings out a piece of wire. She slides it inbetween a window and the door and jiggled it about. The door to the car unlocked. Amazed at what she had done, you fired a small pulse into the car to deactivate the alarm. You then go over to the passenger side and climb in. Sam fumbles underneath the car and, suddenly, the car starts. Sam climbs in and starts driving after the departing lights of the black car. "I'm impressed, where'd you learn that?" you ask Sam. "My mum's a criminal" she said "I picked up a few things" "Keep the light off, we don't want to attract they're attention" you say. After what seems like hours, you arrive at a warehouse. "Abbie must be here" you say. You stayed in the car and watched several men in black get out of the car and head towards the warehouse. "I'm goin in" you say "Stay here, if i'm not back in thirty minutes, call the police and tell them where Abbie is" Sam nodded. You got out of the car and headed towards the warehouse. You tried one of the doors. It was, as you had anticipated, locked. "I could really use Sam's lock picking skills now" you thought "I guess i'll have to do with my own talents" You then quickly sent sparks through the metal lock. You switched the electric charge on the locking mechanism, so that it repelled the other metallic charges, causing it to unlock. You slowly opened the door and walked inside. You heard voices coming from up ahead. You crept forward and peered round the corner. You saw six men with guns, surrounding Abbie, making sure that she couldn't escape. She was wrapped in an electric blanket, which kept her body temperature high enough so that she couldn't produce ice. She was sweating like crazy. You quickly step out and reveal yourself to the six men. Abbie's eyes widened at the sight of you. The six men all trained their guns on you. "Take one more step and we'll shoot" said one of the men, probably the leader. Looking down, you saw that the floor was metal. You signalled for Abbie to raise her feet off the ground. Abbie, realising what you planned to do, lifted her feet off the ground. You stepped forward, channeling your electricity through you and to the metallic ground. The men were shocked to say the least. They were all knocked unconscious by the blast. It wasn't a major shock. Just enough to knock them out. You ran over to Abbie and untied her, taking off the electric blanket. "Lets get out of here" you say. She gets up, but stumbles. You put her hand over your shoulder and, her leaning on you for support, you proceed to sneak out of the warehouse. You leave the warehouse and break into a light jog for the car you had arrived in. You and Abbie jumped in the back.

choices: Suit up and go after him.
Seek help from a young super hero.
132.content:
You are Madam Witch (Maria Storm), a thirty five year old woman, with long, flowing brown hair and bright hazel, almost yellow eyes. Physically, you are near perfection with a figure that models would kill for and strong attributes. You were a legend among super heroines with the ability to manipulate magic. Your only weakness, you could never work potions as you were allergic to even the most basic of ingredients. Your mother, a witch of an unknown coven, disapproved of your heroic activities and constantly tried to convince you to 'disappear'.

Twelve years ago, you faced the the most notorious villain ever, he called himself Scilock. This super villain was a mad genius with an inert talent for magic, he used high tech gadgetry and magical artifacts to steal money and magical items to increase both his wealth and power. Only the more he obtained, the more he wanted. You and Scilock had crossed swords a number of times, each ending in a stalemate. He always managed to escape justice and you always managed to stop him from obtaining his goal. With each encounter over next two years, the dialog between the two of you became more intimate. Unknown to you, it was Scilock's way of manipulating women but, unknown to him, he was actually falling in love with you.

Then, tragedy struck, forcing you and him to work together. A massive, man made storm from an unknown super villain threatened the entire city. You convinced Scilock, who had secretly fallen for you, to help save the city. Together, with your combined talents, found and deactivated the weather machine responsible for the storm. However, the machine was detonated before either of you could get out of range. Those who knew you, mourned their loss. Few mourned over Scilock, though they knew, in his final hours, he turned good. Unknown to the world at large, you and Scilock both survived, though you were badly injured. He slowly nursed you back to health and the two of you married shortly after, leaving the world to believe you were both dead.

Ten years later, you, Maria Strong, and your husband, Max, returned home from a night out to discover that your home had been ransacked. Stephanie, the teenage girl you had hired to watch over your nine year old daughter, Megan was unconscious on the floor and the door to Megan's bedroom had been ripped off its hinges. Fearing the worst, you ran for Megan's room while Max tended to the baby sitter.

"Megan!?" you called, rushing into her room. "Honey, are you in here!?"

No answer came but you found a note on her bed, held there by a knife, trusted into the mattress. It read...

'Scilock... If you wish to ever see your daughter alive again you will return to us and reclaim your proper place in the Council of Chaos.... You have seven days to comply or your daughter will face our wrath.'

"The Council of Chaos?" you muttered. "Max never mentioned this to me."

You took the note and marched downstairs to the living room where Max was giving Stephanie an ice pack her her head and roughly pulled him out of ear shot before handing him the note.

"Would you care to explain this?" you whispered, angrily. "You never told me you were a member of this group!"

Max read the note and turned red with anger himself. "I never was a member." he whispered back. "My father was and he was a bitter enemy of your mother, they just assumed that I would take my father's place but I was more of a solo act and refused them."

Hearing this caused you to turn pale, now understanding your mothers protests against you marrying Max. You still loved him with all of your heart and you were not about to let him face this alone.

"Take care of Stephanie, Maria." he said suddenly. "I'll be in the basement."

"Oh no you don't, Max!" you whispered, stopping him. "Megan is my daughter!"

"And you are my wife!" Max fired back. "I can not, will not allow you to place yourself into danger, this is my hunt!"

With that, he pushed passed you and ran for the basement stairs, to entrance of his secret lair. You sighed, shaking your head and walked over to Stephanie. Twenty minutes later, Stephanie was well paid and sent home, magically influenced to believe that she, you, and Max had made their reports to the police. Once she was gone, you moved down stairs to find Max. Only you discovered that his old costume was missing from its display, along with a large number of his new gadgets and magical items.

"Oh, God!" you thought. "He's gone after them!" you started to shiver. "We've been out of practice for ten years, he won't stand a chance unless I can get some help!"

What do you do?
132.title: Enemies become lovers.

1323.content:
You had heard of one super hero team but you were not sure if they would help, their parents had also fought Scilock when he was a super villain. Still there was little time and there was no one else who could help. You took one look at Max's picture, it was taken on the day of your wedding. Max was a tall, powerfully built man, completely bald, with eyes that had the color of fire, a result of his power. You gently ran your finger over his rock like chin on the photograph.

"I'm coming, Max." you whispered tearfully. "It's my turn to save you."

With that, you ran upstairs to the attic and entered your lair. Your husband's lair, in the basement, looked much like a high tech laboratory, your lair was all magic. In the center of the secret room was a huge cauldron with a gas powered flame beneath it. Along all but one of the walls were shelves upon selves of books, containing spells, incantations, magical history of the city, and so on. On the one wall, free of books were shelves of jars and vials, containing various powders and liquids to make potions. You wrinkled your nose at that wall as you could never master potion making.

"Pyro Globious!" you commanded.

The fire below the cauldron ignited and you waved your hand over it, casting a spell...

"By the command of my magical might find me the girl of fire and flight, bring to me this heroine to hear my plight with a signal that lights the night!"

The cauldron, responding to your magical command, sent forth a line of fire, creating a signal hight into the night sky, only visible by the girl you hoped to summon and her team of young superheros.


http://www.animeonline.net/gallery/data/...

Once the spell was cast and the signal was sent, you let out a low sigh. "All I must do now, is wait." you said to yourself. then you whispered, "Please hurry."

132311.content:
"Madam Witch, you are a legend to us." said Will, honestly. "You saved my parents lives when they were only dating, if it were not for you..." he paused. "Of course we will help!"

"You got my vote." said Jack. "You saved my mom before she met my dad..."

"The point is, you have touched all of our lives." said violet. "We will help get your daughter back. Once your husband knows that she is safe, he will do his part and we can shut down the Council of Chaos forever."

"We will need a plan." said Mary. "Do you know if... err..."

"Max." you said. "Max Storm."

"Do you know if Max had any floor plans of the Council's lair?" asked Mary.

After a thought, you replied, "Yes, in his laboratory. As I explained, I also know where the council lair is and I have a way to track Max." you paused. "Just in case..."

Violet nodded. "We understand." she said. "Old habits are hard to break but it's never too late to change."

"I appreciate that." you said. "Err, what is your alter ego, Violet?"

Violet paused. "I don't have one." she replied. "I figured there are so many violets out there...."

You shook your head. "Not in one city." you told her. "You need a name, let me see..."

After taking a moment to think, you said, "How does Tomboy sound? I think it suits you, a tough girl who can make everything around her tough as well."

Violet smiled. "Not bad." she said, blushing. "I... I'll think about it."

You nodded. "I'll take you to Scilock's lair." you said. "Once inside, please do not touch anything unless I am watching."
132311.title: It's never too late to change.

1323111.content:
Will, Jack, Mary, and Violet were all frightened and awed to be inside the lair of one of the most dangerous villains of their parents' time. The lair was set up much like a mad scientist's laboratory with nearly countless stations of only a madman would think to need.

"Most of these stations have not been used in years." you said, easing their worries slightly. "When Max turned to the side of good, he routed everything to this one station."

All looked to see a huge monitor, made up of dozens of screens. Below it was a long and complex control panel, which they guessed did the work of all of the other stations in the lair.

"Here are the floor plans for the lair of the Council of Chaos." you said, keying the information to the screen.

http://www.estalia.net/imaginary/ivy4.gi...

"Please understand that this data is at least five years out of date." you said. "Unfortunately, it's all I got."

Will nodded, already knowing you were telling the truth, and carefully examined the floor plans. "I think we can work with this, Madam witch." he said. "In the mean time, could you show me something, belonging to Megan, that she greatly cherished? A favorite doll, teddy bear, blanket?"

"I could." you replied, wondering why Will wanted to look at it. "Why?"

"I am Psychic Boy." replied Will. "I can track your daughter down with my mind, using something cherished by her as a focal point." he then blushed. "However, I may start to act like her for a moment, to establish a link to her for you."

You rose a hand to your mouth to stifle a giggle. "Megan is very attached to a pink blanket Max gave her last year." you said. "I'll get it for you."

With that you rushed out the exit but not before repeating your warning. "Don't play with anything!"

Once you were gone, the four young super heroes looked about the lair, curious...
